body:
Charliecloud now uses the autotools build system. It isn't clear how to update the package to handle both hand-rolled Makefile and autotool packages depending on the version. Please advise.

FWIIW, upstream (us) does not support older versions of Charliecloud. Must we complicate the spack package to include unsupported versions? Do other packages rely on Charliecloud?
title: add charliecloud/0.13
